TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SchemaImporterExtension extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许在使用自动查询工具时自定义从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成的代码。

span.span: Allows you to customize the code generated from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document when using automated query tools.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要通过工具（如 Visual Studio 中的 "添加 Web 引用" 对话框，或使用[Web 服务描述语言工具（wsdl.exe））](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)生成 Web 服务代理，就会发生架构导入。Schema importation occurs whenever a Web service proxy is produced through a tool such as the Add Web Reference dialog box found in Visual Studio, or by using the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88). 使用[XML 架构定义工具（xsd.exe）](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe)生成特定 Xsd 文档中的代码时，也会发生架构导入。Schema importation also occurs when using the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe) to generate code from a specific XSD document. 使用 类，可以修改使用其中任一工具时生成的代码。The class allows you to modify the code generated when using any of these tools. 例如，您可能有一个在系统上处理图书订单的现有类，并且您有一个提供订单的现有 XSD 文档。For example, you may have an existing class that processes book orders on a system and you have an existing XSD document that supplies your orders. 使用 类，您可以启用其中一个工具来生成使用您的类的代码。Using the class, you can enable one of the tools to generate code that uses your class. 若要控制代码的生成，必须使用 命名空间中找到的类。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 codedom](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom)和[codedom 快速参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx). 启用 WSDL.EXE 工具的步骤，其他工具（如 "添加 Web 引用" 对话框）使用扩展的步骤如下：The steps to enabling the WSDL.exe tool (which in turn is used by other tools such as the Add Web Reference dialog box) to use your extension are: 1. 创建 类的实现。Create an implementation of the class. 2. 使用 方法为代码生成器编写代码。Use the method to write code for the code generator. 方法包含一些参数，这些参数允许你检查截获的 XSD 类型，并创建用于生成新的 CLR 代码的 CodeDOM 对象。The method contains parameters that allow you to examine the intercepted XSD type and create CodeDOM objects that are used to generate the new CLR code. 3. 如果需要，请使用 方法来处理 \ 元素。If required, use the method to handle \ elements found in the XSD document. 4. 如果需要，请使用 方法检查 XSD 文档中找到的默认值并返回不同的默认值。If required, use the method to examine default values found in the XSD document and return a different default value. 5. 将扩展编译到库中。Compile your extension into a library. 6. 为程序集签名。Sign the assembly. 7. 将程序集安装到全局程序集缓存（GAC）中。Install the assembly in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC). 8. 修改 machine.config 文件以包含扩展名。Modify the machine.config file to include the extension. ## Examples 请参阅[SchemaImporterExtension 技术示例](/dotnet/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextension-technology-sample)。See the [SchemaImporterExtension Technology Sample](/dotnet/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextension-technology-sample). 请注意，此示例不包括已签名的程序集。Note that this example does not include a signed assembly. 相反，它演示了如何将 与命令窗口一起使用。Instead, it demonstrates how to use the with a command window.

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

param.name: any
param.span: 在 XML 架构文档 (XSD) 中找到的 元素。

span.span: The element found in the XML Schema Document (XSD).

param.name: mixed
param.span: 如果 XSD 特性已设置为“mixed”，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate the XSD attribute has been set to "mixed"; otherwise, .

param.name: schemas
param.span: 在 XSD 中找到的架构的集合。

span.span: The collection of schemas found in the XSD.
The importer being used.

param.name: compileUnit
param.span: ，可向其添加 CodeDOM 结构以生成 XSD 的备选代码。

span.span: A to which you can add CodeDOM structures to generate alternative code for the XSD.
The current namespace for the element.

param.name: options
param.span: 枚举值的按位组合，这些枚举值指定代码编译器上的设置选项。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the setting options on the code compiler.

param.name: codeProvider
param.span: 用来生成新代码的 CodeDOM 提供程序。

span.span: The CodeDOM provider used to generate the new code.

summary.span: 处理架构中的 <xsd:any> 元素的导入。

span.span: Handles the importation of the <xsd:any> elements in the schema.

returns.span: 该元素映射到的 CLR 类型的名称。

span.span: The name of the CLR type that the element maps to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制代码的生成，必须使用 命名空间中找到的类。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 codedom](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom)和[codedom 快速参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.CodeDom.CodeExpression ImportDefaultValue(string value, string type) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ImportDefaultValue (value As String, type As String) As CodeExpression
public: virtual System::CodeDom::CodeExpression ^ ImportDefaultValue(System::String ^ value, System::String ^ type);
abstract member ImportDefaultValue : string * string -> System.CodeDom.CodeExpression override this.ImportDefaultValue : string * string -> System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

span.span: The value found in the original XSD.
The XSD type name.

summary.span: 允许为正在导入的 XSD 类型指定默认值。

span.span: Allows you to specify the default value for the XSD type being imported.
A setting the new default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制代码的生成，必须使用 命名空间中找到的类。In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 codedom](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom)和[codedom 快速参考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).

summary.span: 允许您检查导入的架构并指定该架构映射到的 CLR 类型，从而对生成的代码进行操作。

span.span: Allows you to manipulate the code generated by examining the imported schema and specifying the CLR type that it maps to.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的简单实现。The example below shows a simple implementation of the method. 代码将检查命名空间和名称。The code checks the namespace and name. 当找到正确的值时，它会添加必须在生成的代码中引用的自定义程序集（"Order .dll"）的名称。When the right values are found, it adds the name of a custom assembly ("Order.dll") that must be referenced in the generated code. 然后，它将添加在代码中生成的新命名空间（"Microsoft 示例"）。It then adds a new namespace ("Microsoft.Samples") that is generated in the code. [!code-csharp[SchemaImporterExtensionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SchemaImporterExtensionExample/CS/SchemaImporterExtensionExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SchemaImporterExtensionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SchemaImporterExtensionExample/VB/SchemaImporterExtensionExample.vb#1)]
